profileAlternative.name: Elizeu Ferreira
profileAlternative.headline: Oracle and SQL Server DBA at ERP Connex
profileAlternative.summary:
Oracle Database Administrator with over twelve years of experience, all of them managing Oracle databases in critical environments. Expertise in Oracle database management in all UNIX flavors as well as Windows versions. Excellent skills on all Oracle database's tools: RMAN, ASM, Oracle RAC, Oracle Enterprise Manager 11g GRID Control, Oracle Enterprise Manager 12c Cloud Control, Oracle Standby Database, Oracle E-Business Suit, etc. Oracle Database Certified Professional 10g, 11g and 12c; Oracle Certified Expert RAC 11gR2 specialist and ITIL Foundation certified. Spoken language: English, French, and Portuguese.

Specialties: Oracle database 8i, 9i, 10g, 11g, and 12c, Oracle RAC 9i, 10g, 11g, and 12c, SQL Server 2008, 2012, 2014, and Oracle E-Business Suite installation, management and troubleshooting

positions.title: Oracle and SQL Server DBA
positions.description:
At ERP Connex, I am responsible for managing all Oracle and SQL Server databases and providing support for the teams that work with Oracle PeopleSoft and UNIT4 Business World ERPs. As a Senior DBA, I am responsible for performing all activities related with all Oracle and SQL Server databases to guarantee the availability and evolution of the applications utilized by our customers.

Responsibilities:

• Data migration using SSIS packages (file to database and database to file)
• Report development with SSRS
• Oracle database 8i migration to SQL Server 2014 using SSIS packages (ETL)
• Oracle database 11g and 12c installation and management on Linux and Solaris
• SQL Server 2012, 2014, and 2016 management and installation
• UNIT 4 Business World refresh (database and application)
• Oracle RAC 11gR2 management and patching
• Write technical documents
• Oracle PeopleSoft conversion to Unicode using Data Mover and Datapump
• Oracle and SQL Server database cloning using RMAN, Datapump, and SSMS (GUI and T-SQL)
• Database backup and recover implementation and management
• Performance troubleshooting using OEM and the performance reports (AWR, ADDM, ASH, etc.)
• Oracle database upgrade from 11g to 12c and conversion from non-CDB to PDB (Oracle Multitenant)
• Maintenance task automation using OEM 12c jobs
…

positions.title: Senior Oracle DBA
positions.description:
At Desjardins, I worked in the production team. Our goal was to provide support to the application teams and implement all modification that could keep the databases available. Our team provided 24/7 on call support to more than 1000 Oracle databases and was responsible for working with the other teams in the implementation of application and infrastructure changes. Desjardins has a unique environment which requires a high problem-solving skill level and a great capability to work under pressure. In exchange, it offers a variety of interesting projects which allows all employees to keep improving their skill and responsibilities.

Responsibilities:

• Oracle RAC 11gR2 and 12c installation, management, patching, and upgrade
• Performance troubleshooting using advisors, performance reports (AWR, ADDM, ASH, etc.), and OEM Cloud Control
• Database and cluster patching (PSU, CPU, BUG Fix, etc.)
• Provide first and second level support to SQL Server databases
• Database backup and recovery using RMAN
• Configure the Oracle Data Guard 10g, 11g, and 12c
• Oracle database 10g, 11g, and 12c installation, management, migration, and upgrade
• Create and manage Oracle databases running on the Cloud (Oracle Multitenant)
• Write technical documents used by the DBA team
• Implement and manage database features like Partitioning, FGA, ILM, etc.

positions.title: Senior Oracle DBA
positions.description:
At Scotiabank, I was a member of the team responsible for providing 24/7 support to more than 1700 Oracle databases. Our team had the goal of guaranteeing the availability, security, and integrity of all information that our customers need to be able to perform their bank transactions. In order to keep offering a great service, the bank invests heavily in technology which creates a great environment with lots of challenges and good opportunities to learn about new products and features available.

Responsibilities:

• Oracle 12c POC documentation and implementation for Oracle database, Oracle cluster (RAC), and Oracle Data Guard technologies
• Upgrade of 11gR2 databases to 12cR1 version on Linux and Solaris
• Oracle Physical Standby database 12cR1 configuration with Oracle Data Guard Broker
• Oracle RAC upgrade from 11gR2 to 12cR1 on Linux and Solaris
• Databases and cluster patching (PSU, CPU, etc.)
• Oracle database administration and performance tuning troubleshooting and resolution
• Oracle database backup, recover, and refresh using RMAN
• Oracle database and Oracle RAC deployment and administration using OEM 11g and 12c

At VIVO, I was part of the team that was responsible for providing support to the databases in the production, test and development environments. Our team was responsible for guaranteeing the availability and functioning of more than 3000 environments. We were also responsible for applying all the changes needed to follow the applications' evolution and availability (database installation, upgrade, backup/recovery, object creation/modification, etc). VIVO has one of the Brazil's most diversified IT environments and it has many critical environments which are supported by Oracle, SQL Server, DB2 and Teradata databases.

• Oracle RAC 10g and 11gR2 installation, upgrade and management
• Provide support to the development team
